meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he sware to always tell the truth.
meanings.sent2: She sware to keep the secret safe.
meanings.sent3: The parrot sware loudly, mimicking its owner.
meanings.sent4: The old tree sware to stand tall against any storm.
meanings.sent5: The knight sware an oath to protect the kingdom with all his might.

meanings.sent1: Last night, she sware she saw a shooting star.
meanings.sent2: He sware he would never forget her birthday again.
meanings.sent3: The cat sware it caught the biggest mouse in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The river sware to carry the memories of the town to the sea.
meanings.sent5: The child sware to always be brave, no matter what.
